name: Adamantine Armor
description: Armor that negates critical hits.

name: Adamantine Weapon
description: A weapon made from adamantine, bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks and critical hits.

name: Alchemy Jug
description: A ceramic jug that can produce various liquids.

name: Ammunition of Slaying
description: Special ammunition that deals extra damage to a specific creature type.

name: Ammunition +1
description: Magical ammunition that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Ammunition +2
description: Magical ammunition that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Ammunition +3
description: Magical ammunition that grants a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Amulet of Health
description: Sets Constitution to 19.

name: Amulet of Proof Against Detection and Location
description: Prevents magical detection and location.

name: Amulet of the Devout +1
description: A holy symbol that boosts spell attacks and DCs for clerics and paladins.

name: Amulet of the Devout +2
description: A holy symbol that boosts spell attacks and DCs for clerics and paladins.

name: Amulet of the Devout +3
description: A holy symbol that boosts spell attacks and DCs for clerics and paladins.

name: Amulet of the Planes
description: Allows the wearer to travel to other planes of existence.

name: Animated Shield
description: A shield that protects you on its own.

name: Antitoxin
description: (Herbal/Non-magical potion.) Advantage on poison condition (avoid or end) for 1 hour.

name: Apparatus of Kwalish
description: A large mechanical vehicle shaped like a lobster.

name: Arcane Grimoire +1
description: A spellbook that boosts spell attacks and DCs for wizards.

name: Arcane Grimoire +2
description: A spellbook that boosts spell attacks and DCs for wizards.

name: Arcane Grimoire +3
description: A spellbook that boosts spell attacks and DCs for wizards.

name: Armor of Gleaming
description: This armor never gets dirty.

name: Armor of Invulnerability
description: Heavy armor. Resistance to nonmagical damage. Immunity to nonmagical 10 mins 1x/day.

name: Armor of Resistance (Acid)
description: Armor that grants resistance to acid damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Cold)
description: Armor that grants resistance to cold damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Fire)
description: Armor that grants resistance to fire damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Force)
description: Armor that grants resistance to force damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Lightning)
description: Armor that grants resistance to lightning damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Necrotic)
description: Armor that grants resistance to necrotic damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Poison)
description: Armor that grants resistance to poison damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Psychic)
description: Armor that grants resistance to psychic damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Radiant)
description: Armor that grants resistance to radiant damage.

name: Armor of Resistance (Thunder)
description: Armor that grants resistance to thunder damage.

name: Armor of Vulnerability
description: Resistance to one damage types: Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing; Cursed with vulnerability to the other two until armor removed and Remove Curse is cast.

name: Armor +1
description: Armor with a +1 bonus to AC.

name: Armor +2
description: Armor with a +2 bonus to AC.

name: Armor +3
description: Armor with a +3 bonus to AC.

name: Arrow-Catching Shield
description: A shield that draws missiles to itself.

name: Axe of the Dwarvish Lords
description: A legendary battleaxe that grants powerful abilities and is tied to dwarven heritage.

name: Baba Yaga's Dancing Broom
description: A magical broom that can fly and fight on its own.

name: Bag of Beans
description: A bag of magical beans with unpredictable effects.

name: Bag of Devouring
description: A bag that consumes objects placed inside.

name: Bag of Holding
description: Stores items in an extra-dimensional space.

name: Bag of Tricks (Gray)
description: Summons random animals.

name: Bag of Tricks (Rust)
description: Summons random animals.

name: Bag of Tricks (Tan)
description: Summons random animals.

name: Barrier Tattoo
description: A magical tattoo that increases AC.

name: Bead of Force
description: A bead that explodes and traps creatures inside a force sphere.

name: Bead of Nourishment
description: A tiny bead that provides as much nourishment as 1 day of rations.

name: Bead of Refreshment
description: A tiny bead that can turn into enough water to sustain a creature for 1 day.

name: Bell Branch
description: A druidic focus that helps detect fey, fiends, or undead.

name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
description: Grants advantages related to dwarves and increases Constitution.

name: Belt of Giant Strength (cloud)
description: A belt that sets your Strength score to 27 while worn.

name: Belt of Giant Strength (fire)
description: A belt that sets your Strength score to 25 while worn.

name: Belt of Giant Strength (frost)
description: A belt that sets your Strength score to 23 while worn.

name: Belt of Giant Strength (hill)
description: A belt that sets your Strength score to 21 while worn.

name: Belt of Giant Strength (stone)
description: A belt that sets your Strength score to 23 while worn.

name: Belt of Giant Strength (storm)
description: A belt that sets your Strength score to 29 while worn.

name: Berserker Axe
description: A magic axe that grants a bonus to attack and damage rolls, but can curse its wielder with berserk rage.

name: Blackrazor
description: A sentient greatsword that devours souls and grants its wielder life-draining powers.

name: Bloodwell Vial +1
description: A focus for sorcerers that boosts spell attacks and DCs.

name: Bloodwell Vial +2
description: A focus for sorcerers that boosts spell attacks and DCs.

name: Bloodwell Vial +3
description: A focus for sorcerers that boosts spell attacks and DCs.

name: Book of Exalted Deeds
description: A legendary tome of good, granting powerful boons to those of pure heart.

name: Book of Vile Darkness
description: A legendary tome of evil, granting dark powers to those who dare read it.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
description: Wearer moves silently.

name: Boots of False Tracks
description: These boots leave tracks of a different kind of humanoid.

name: Boots of Levitation
description: Allows the wearer to levitate at will.

name: Boots of Speed
description: Doubles movement speed.

name: Boots of Striding and Springing
description: Increases speed and jumping.

name: Boots of the Winterlands
description: Protects the wearer from cold and snow.

name: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals
description: A magical bowl that can summon and control water elementals when filled with water.

name: Bracers of Archery
description: Bracers that grant proficiency and bonus damage with longbows and shortbows.

name: Bracers of Defense
description: Increases AC when not wearing armor.

name: Brazier of Commanding Fire Elementals
description: Controls fire elementals.

name: Brooch of Shielding
description: Grants resistance to force damage and immunity to Magic Missile.

name: Broom of Flying
description: A broom that can be ridden and flown.

name: Candle of Invocation
description: A candle that aids in summoning and spellcasting.

name: Candle of the Deep
description: This candle stays lit even in strong wind and underwater.

name: Cap of Water Breathing
description: A cap that allows the wearer to breathe underwater.

name: Cape of the Mountebank
description: Allows the wearer to teleport in a puff of smoke.

name: Carpet of Flying (3'x5')
description: A magical carpet that can fly. (3'x5' 200# 80')

name: Carpet of Flying (4'x6')
description: A magical carpet that can fly. (4'x6' 400# 60')

name: Carpet of Flying (5'x7')
description: A magical carpet that can fly. (5'x7' 600# 40')

name: Carpet of Flying (6'x9')
description: A magical carpet that can fly. (6'x9' 800# 30')

name: Cast-Off Armor
description: You can doff this armor as an action.

name: Cauldron of Rebirth
description: A magical cauldron that can bring the dead back to life and serves as a spellcasting focus for druids and warlocks.

name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
description: Summons an air elementals up to 1 hour. Obeys your commands.

name: Charlatan's Die
description: A weighted die that always rolls the number you wish.

name: Chime of Opening
description: Opens locked doors or containers when struck.

name: Circlet of Blasting
description: A circlet that lets you cast the Scorching Ray spell.

name: Cloak of Arachnida
description: Grants spider climb and resistance to poison.

name: Cloak of Billowing
description: As a bonus action, make this cloak billow dramatically.

name: Cloak of Displacement
description: Makes wearer harder to hit.

name: Cloak of Elvenkind
description: Grants advantage on Stealth checks.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: Grants invisibility to the wearer.

name: Cloak of Many Fashions
description: Change the style, color, and apparent quality of this cloak as a bonus action.

name: Cloak of Protection
description: A cloak that grants a bonus to AC and saving throws.

name: Cloak of the Bat
description: Allows you to fly in dim light or darkness and turn into a bat.

name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
description: Lets you breathe underwater and swim speed 60 ft.

name: Clockwork Amulet
description: Once per day, forgo rolling a d20 for an attack roll and take a 10 instead.

name: Clothes of Mending
description: If torn or damaged, these clothes mend themselves at dawn.

name: Crystal Ball
description: A legendary scrying device used to see distant places or creatures.

name: Crystal Ball of Mind Reading
description: A crystal ball that allows scrying and reading the thoughts of creatures.

name: Crystal Ball of Telepathy
description: A crystal ball that allows scrying and telepathic communication with creatures.

name: Crystal Ball of True Seeing
description: A crystal ball that allows scrying and seeing through illusions and invisibility.

name: Cube of Force
description: A cube that can create a protective barrier against various types of attacks.

name: Cube of Summoning
description: A cube that can summon extraplanar creatures to aid the user.

name: Cubic Gate
description: A cube that can open portals to other planes of existence.

name: Daern's Instant Fortress
description: A small cube that transforms into a massive, indestructible fortress.

name: Dagger of Venom
description: A dagger that can poison its target.

name: Dancing Sword
description: A sword that can fight on its own.

name: Dark Shard Amulet
description: A magical amulet that serves as a spellcasting focus for warlocks and can be used to try to cast a cantrip (1x/day. DC 10 skillcheck)

name: Decanter of Endless Water
description: Produces an endless supply of fresh water.

name: Deck of Illusions
description: Creates illusions when cards are drawn.

name: Deck of Many Things
description: A deck of magical cards with unpredictable and powerful effects.

name: Defender
description: A weapon that can transfer its bonus to AC.

name: Demon Armor
description: A suit of armor that grants resistance to certain damage types and enhances melee attacks.

name: Demonomicon of Iggwilv
description: A legendary tome containing secrets of demons and powerful spells.

name: Dimensional Shackles
description: Prevents teleportation and planar travel.

name: Dragon Scale Mail
description: Magical scale mail made from dragon scales, granting resistance and enhanced senses.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: A weapon that deals extra damage to dragons.

name: Dread Helm
description: A helm that causes your eyes to glow red when worn.

name: Driftglobe
description: A small sphere that sheds light and can cast Daylight.

name: Dust of Disappearance
description: Makes creatures invisible.

name: Dust of Dryness
description: Absorbs large amounts of water.

name: Dust of Sneezing and Choking
description: Causes sneezing and choking.

name: Dwarven Plate
description: Heavy armor that increases AC and resists forced movement.

name: Dwarven Thrower

name: Ear Horn of Hearing

name: Efreeti Bottle

name: Efreeti Chain
description: Legendary chainmail with fire resistance and other powers.

name: Elemental Gem

name: Elemental Gem (emerald)
description: A gem that can summon an air elemental.

name: Elemental Gem (red corundum)
description: A gem that can summon a fire elemental.

name: Elemental Gem (yellow diamond)
description: A gem that can summon an earth elemental.

name: Elixir of Health
description: A potion that cures all magical contagions and removes conditions.

name: Elven Chain
description: Light chainmail that doesn't require proficiency.

name: Enduring Spellbook
description: A spellbook that is immune to fire and water damage.

name: Energy Bow
description: A magical bow (longbow or shortbow) that fires arrows of pure energy.

description: Casts a spell 6x/day

description: Casts a spell 6x/day

name: Ersatz Eye
description: Prosthetic eye that functions as a normal eye. Can't be removed against your will while you're alive

name: Eversmoking Bottle
description: Produces a cloud of smoke.

name: Executioner's Axe
description: A heavy axe designed for executions, often with magical properties.

name: Eye and Hand of Vecna
description: Legendary artifacts that grant immense power but corrupt the user.

name: Eyes of Charming
description: Lets you cast Charm Person.

name: Eyes of Minute Seeing
description: Grants advantage on Investigation checks for small details.

name: Eyes of the Eagle
description: Grants advantage on Perception checks involving sight.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Bronze Griffon)
description: Transforms into a griffon for up to 6 hours.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Ebony Fly)
description: Transforms into a giant fly for up to 12 hours.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Golden Lions)
description: Transforms into two lions for up to 1 hour.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Ivory Goats)
description: Transforms into three different goats: Travail, Travel, and Terror.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant)
description: Transforms into an elephant for up to 24 hours.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Obsidian Steed)
description: Transforms into a nightmare for up to 24 hours.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Onyx Dog)
description: Transforms into a mastiff for up to 6 hours.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Serpentine Owl)
description: Transforms into a giant owl for up to 8 hours.

name: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Silver Raven)
description: Transforms into a raven for up to 12 hours.

name: Flame Tongue
description: A sword that bursts into flame.

name: Folding Boat
description: A boat that folds into a small box.

name: Frost Brand
description: A sword that deals cold damage and sheds light.

name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
description: Sets Strength to 19.

name: Gem of Brightness
description: A gem that emits bright light and can blind.

name: Gem of Seeing
description: Lets you see invisible creatures and objects.

name: Giant Slayer
description: A weapon that deals extra damage to giants.

name: Glamoured Studded Leather
description: Studded leather armor that can magically change its appearance at will.

name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
description: Lets you catch missiles.

name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
description: Grants advantage on Athletics checks for swimming and climbing.

name: Gloves of Thievery
description: Grants bonus to Sleight of Hand and Stealth.

name: Goggles of Night
description: Grants darkvision.

name: Guardian Emblem
description: A holy symbol that can prevent critical hits. 3x/day.

name: Hag Eye
description: A magical eye used by hags to spy on others.

name: Hammer of Thunderbolts
description: A legendary warhammer with thunder powers.

name: Hat of Disguise
description: Lets you cast Disguise Self at will.

name: Hat of Many Spells
description: A wizard's hat that can store and cast spells.

name: Hat of Vermin
description: Can produce harmless bats, frogs, or rats.

name: Hat of Wizardry
description: Attunement by wizard. Spell focus for your wizard spells. Can try to cast a wizard cantrip you don't know 1x/day (DC 10 Arcana). Cantrip must have casting time of 1 action.

name: Headband of Intellect
description: A headband that sets your Intelligence score to 19.

name: Helm of Brilliance
description: A helm studded with gems that can cast spells.

name: Helm of Comprehending Languages
description: Lets you understand any spoken language.

name: Helm of Telepathy
description: Lets you read minds and communicate telepathically.

name: Helm of Teleportation
description: A magical helm that allows the wearer to cast the Teleport spell.

name: Heward's Handy Haversack
description: A backpack with extra-dimensional storage.

name: Heward's Handy Spice Pouch
description: A magical pouch that produces a variety of spices on command.

name: Holy Avenger
description: A legendary sword for paladins.

name: Horn of Blasting
description: Emits a destructive blast of sound.

name: Horn of Silent Alarm
description: A horn that can be blown to alert a chosen creature without making a sound to others.

name: Horn of Valhalla (brass)
description: A horn that summons warrior spirits to fight for you.

name: Horn of Valhalla (bronze)
description: A horn that summons powerful warrior spirits to fight for you.

name: Horn of Valhalla (iron)
description: A horn that summons the most powerful warrior spirits to fight for you.

name: Horn of Valhalla (silver)
description: A horn that summons skilled warrior spirits to fight for you.

name: Horseshoes of a Zephyr
description: Allows a horse to move above the ground and never leave tracks.

name: Horseshoes of Speed
description: Increases a horse's speed.

name: Immovable Rod
description: A rod that becomes fixed in space when activated. 8000 lb limit.

name: Instrument of Illusions
description: A musical instrument that can create minor illusions.

name: Instrument of Scribing
description: A musical instrument that can magically scribe messages.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Anstruth Harp)
description: A legendary bardic instrument with powerful magic.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Canaith Mandolin)
description: A rare bardic instrument with magical properties.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Cli Lyre)
description: A rare bardic instrument with magical properties.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Doss Lute)
description: An uncommon bardic instrument with magical properties.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Fochlucan Bandore)
description: An uncommon bardic instrument with magical properties.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Mac-Fuirmidh Cittern)
description: An uncommon bardic instrument with magical properties.

name: Instrument of the Bards (Ollamh Harp)
description: A legendary bardic instrument with powerful magic.

name: Ioun Stone (Absorption)
description: Marbled lavender and green ellipsoid. Absorbs spells targeted at you.

name: Ioun Stone (Agility)
description: Deep red sphere. Increases Dexterity score.

name: Ioun Stone (Awareness)
description: Dark blue rhomboid. Prevents you from being surprised.

name: Ioun Stone (Fortitude)
description: Pink rhomboid. Increases Constitution score.

name: Ioun Stone (Greater Absorption)
description: Marbled lavender and green ellipsoid. Absorbs higher-level spells targeted at you.

name: Ioun Stone (Insight)
description: Incandescent blue sphere. Increases Wisdom score.

name: Ioun Stone (Intellect)
description: Marbled scarlet and blue sphere. Increases Intelligence score.

name: Ioun Stone (Leadership)
description: Marbled pink and green sphere. Increases Charisma score.

name: Ioun Stone (Mastery)
description: Pale green prism. Increases proficiency bonus.

name: Ioun Stone (Protection)
description: Dusty rose prism. Increases AC.

name: Ioun Stone (Regeneration)
description: Pearly white spindle. Regenerates hit points over time.

name: Ioun Stone (Reserve)
description: Vibrant violet prism. Stores spells.

name: Ioun Stone (Strength)
description: Pale blue rhomboid. Increases Strength score.

name: Ioun Stone (Sustenance)
description: Clear spindle. No need to eat or drink.

name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
description: A set of iron bands that can restrain a creature when thrown.

name: Iron Flask
description: Can trap extraplanar creatures.

name: Javelin of Lightning
description: A javelin that transforms into a bolt of lightning when thrown.

name: Keoghtom's Ointment
description: A magical ointment that heals wounds and cures diseases.

name: Lantern of Revealing
description: Reveals invisible creatures and objects.

name: Lock of Trickery
description: A lock that is difficult to pick and can magically relock itself.

name: Luck Blade
description: A magical sword that grants luck and can even grant wishes.

name: Lute of Thunderous Thumping
description: A magical club that produces thunderous sounds when struck.

name: Lyre of Building
description: When played, this magical lyre can prevent damage to an object/structure until your next turn. Cast fabricate, move earth, passwall, or summon construct 1x/day.

name: Mace of Disruption
description: A mace that deals extra damage to undead and fiends.

name: Mace of Smiting
description: A mace that deals extra damage to constructs.

name: Mace of Terror
description: A mace that can instill fear.

name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
description: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells.

name: Manual of Bodily Health
description: Increases Constitution permanently.

name: Manual of Gainful Exercise
description: Increases Strength permanently.

name: Manual of Golems (clay)
description: A manual describing how to create a clay golem.

name: Manual of Golems (flesh)
description: A manual describing how to create a flesh golem.

name: Manual of Golems (iron)
description: A manual describing how to create an iron golem.

name: Manual of Golems (stone)
description: A manual describing how to create a stone golem.

name: Manual of Quickness of Action
description: Increases Dexterity permanently.

name: Mariner's Armor
description: Grants swimming speed and water breathing.

name: Medallion of Thoughts
description: Lets you read surface thoughts.

name: Mirror of Life Trapping
description: Traps creatures inside extra-dimensional cells.

name: Mithral Armor
description: Lightweight armor made from mithral, never imposing disadvantage on Stealth checks.

name: Moon Sickle +1
description: A druidic or ranger focus that boosts melee attack and damange, spell attack and DC, and +1d4 to healing spells cast.

name: Moon Sickle +2
description: A druidic or ranger focus that boosts melee attack and damange, spell attack and DC, and +1d4 to healing spells cast.

name: Moon Sickle +3
description: A druidic or ranger focus that boosts melee attack and damange, spell attack and DC, and +1d4 to healing spells cast.

name: Moon-Touched Sword
description: A sword that emits bright moonlight when drawn, effective against creatures vulnerable to light.

name: Moonblade
description: A sentient weapon (greatsword, longsword, rapier, scimitar, or shortsword). The Moonblade grows in power with each new owner, gaining magical properties and abilities. It is famed for its connection to elven heritage.

name: Mystery Key
description: 5% chance to open any lock. On success, the key disappears.

name: Nature's Mantle
description: A cloak and spellcasting focus for Druid/Ranger spells. Can hide in lightly obscured as bonus action.

name: Necklace of Adaptation
description: Allows you to breathe in any environment.

name: Necklace of Fireballs
description: Contains beads that can be thrown to cast Fireball.

name: Necklace of Prayer Beads
description: A necklace with beads that can cast spells.

name: Nine Lives Stealer
description: A weapon that can slay creatures instantly on a critical hit.

name: Nolzur's Marvelous Pigments
description: Paint that creates real, nonmagical objects.

name: Oathbow
description: A bow that deals extra damage to a sworn enemy.

name: Oil of Etherealness
description: Lets you become ethereal for 1 hour.

name: Oil of Sharpness
description: A magical oil that makes a weapon extremely sharp, granting a bonus to attack and damage.

name: Oil of Slipperiness
description: Grants freedom of movement or makes surfaces slippery for 8 hours.

name: Orb of Direction
description: A magical orb that always points north.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
description: A legendary orb that can control dragons and cast powerful spells.

name: Orb of Time
description: A magical orb that can manipulate time in minor ways.

name: Pearl of Power
description: Lets you regain a spell slot.

name: Perfume of Bewitching
description: A perfume that makes the wearer more charming for a short time.

name: Periapt of Health
description: Prevents disease.

name: Periapt of Proof Against Poison
description: Grants immunity to poison.

name: Periapt of Wound Closure
description: Stabilizes you when dying and doubles healing from hit dice.

name: Philter of Love
description: Causes the drinker to become charmed for 1 hour.

name: Pipe of Smoke Monsters
description: A pipe that creates smoke in the shape of monsters.

name: Pipes of Haunting
description: Pipes that can instill fear in creatures that hear them.

name: Pipes of the Sewers
description: Pipes that can summon and control swarms of rats.

name: Plate Armor of Etherealness
description: Plate armor that allows the wearer to become ethereal.

name: Pole of Angling
description: A fishing pole that guarantees a catch.

name: Pole of Collapsing
description: A pole that can collapse into a small rod for easy transport.

name: Portable Hole
description: A cloth that creates an extradimensional hole when spread out.

name: Pot of Awakening
description: A pot that grows a sentient awakened shrub.

name: Potion of Animal Friendship
description: As if you cast Animal Friendship on yourself. 1 hour duration.

name: Potion of Clairvoyance
description: A potion that lets you cast the Clairvoyance spell.

name: Potion of Climbing
description: Grants climbing speed for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Comprehension
description: A potion that lets you understand any spoken or written language.

name: Potion of Diminution
description: As if you cast Reduce on yourself. 1 hour duration.

name: Potion of Fire Breath
description: Lets you breathe fire for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Flying
description: A potion that grants the ability to fly for a limited time.

name: Potion of Gaseous Form
description: Lets you become a gas for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Giant Strength (Cloud)
description: Your Strength score changes to 27 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Giant Strength (Fire)
description: Your Strength score changes to 25 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Giant Strength (Frost)
description: Your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Giant Strength (Hill)
description: Your Strength score changes to 21 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Giant Strength (Stone)
description: Your Strength score changes to 23 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Giant Strength (Storm)
description: Your Strength score changes to 29 for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Greater Invisibility
description: Has the invisible condition for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Growth
description: As if you cast Enlarge on yourself. 1 hour duration.

name: Potion of Healing
description: Heals 2d4+2 hit points.

name: Potion of Heroism
description: Grants temporary hit points and bless for 1 hour.

name: Potion of Invisibility
description: Lets you become invisible for 1 hour. Ends early: make attack roll, deal damage, cast spell.

name: Potion of Invulnerability
description: Resistance to all damage for 1 minute.

name: Potion of Levitation
description: A potion that reduces the drinker's age.

name: Potion of Longevity
description: A potion that reduces the drinker's age.

name: Potion of Mind Reading
description: As if you cast Detect Thoughts on yourself. 1 hour duration.

name: Potion of Poison

name: Potion of Pugilism
description: A potion that enhances unarmed strikes for a short time.
